original_text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:
korean_text: 요셉이 잠에서 깨어 일어나 주의 사자의 분부대로 행하여 그의 아내를 데려왔으나

sentences.original_text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep
did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 천사가 그에게 명한 대로 행하고

sentences.original_text: and took unto him his wife
